Interacts with a specific follower, providing options such as removal.
interactWithOrder(Order) - Method in class UIs.Buyer.BuyerMenu
Displays options for the buyer to interact with a selected order.
interactWithOrder(Order) - Method in class UIs.Buyer.Controllers.OrderController
For a selected order, the buyer can choose what to do with this order : cancel, return, exchange, report an issue, accept solution for a problem, confirm order reception, and return to order history.
interactWithOrder(Order) - Method in class UIs.Menu
Interacts with a specific order, providing options for the user.
interactWithOrder(Order) - Method in class UIs.Seller.Controllers.OrderController
For a selected order, the seller can prepare the order, handle the problem related to the order, or confirm the reshipment reception when a customer sends back items.
interactWithOrder(Order) - Method in class UIs.Seller.SellerMenu
Interacts with a specific order, providing options for the seller.
interactWithProduct() - Method in class UIs.Buyer.Controllers.CatalogController
Displays options for the user to interact with the pointed product.
interactWithSeller() - Method in class UIs.Buyer.Controllers.CatalogController
Interacts with the profile of the pointed seller, allowing the user to follow or unfollow the seller and return to the main catalog menu.
InventoryController - Class in UIs.Seller.Controllers
Class that represents the inventory screen of the platform, where the seller can add, remove or change the quantity of products, as well as add promotions to them

Constructor of the class InventoryController

Returns true if the user has read the notification.
IssueQuery - Class in productClasses.Usages
Class that represents an issue query, which is a request from a buyer to the seller to solve an issue with a product
